title.rendered: Financing for development advocacy in the MDGs

content.rendered: Bob Muchabaiwa (Save the Children) shares insights on how financing for development was included in the multilateral processes surrounding the Millennium Development Goals (MDGs).

excerpt.rendered: Bob Muchabaiwa (Save the Children) shares insights on how financing for development was included in the multilateral processes surrounding the Millennium Development Goals (MDGs).
